description: Cluster designed for tagging OSINT artifacts with relevant strategic framework information. Specifically for Block-H, these tags are related to Healthcare Cybersecurity operations.
name: HITRUST CSF - Operations

values.description: Operating procedures are documented and made available to all users who need them.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Operations: 08.a Documented Operating Procedures

values.description: Changes to the organization, business processes, information processing facilities and systems that affect information security are controlled.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Operations: 08.b Change Management

values.description: The use of resources is monitored, tuned and projections made of future capacity requirements the required system performance.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Operations: 08.c Capacity Management

values.description: Development, testing, and operational environments are separated to reduce the risks of unauthorized access or changes to the operational environment.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Operations: 08.d Separation of Development, Testing and Operational Environments

values.description: Detection, prevention and recovery controls to protect against malware are implemented, combined with appropriate user awareness.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Operations: 08.e Controls Against Malware

values.description: Backup copies of information, software and system images are taken and tested regularly in accordance with an agreed backup policy.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Operations: 08.f Information Backup

values.description: Event logs recording user activities, exceptions, faults and information security events are produced, kept and regularly reviewed.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Operations: 08.g Event Logging

values.description: Logging facilities and log information shall be protected against tampering and unauthorized access.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Operations: 08.h Protection of Log Information

values.description: System administrator and system operator activities are logged and the logs protected and regularly reviewed.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Operations: 08.i Administrator and Operator Logs

values.description: The clocks of all relevant information processing systems within an organization or security domain are synchronized to a single reference time source.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Operations: 08.j Clock Synchronization

values.description: Information about technical vulnerabilities of information systems being used are obtained in a timely fashion, the organizationâ€™s exposure to such vulnerabilities are evaluated, and appropriate measures are taken to address the associated risk.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Operations: 08.l Management of Technical Vulnerabilities

values.description: Rules governing the installation of software by users are established and implemented.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Operations: 08.m Restrictions on Software Installation

values.description: Audit requirements and activities involving verification of operational systems are carefully planned and agreed to minimize disruptions to business processes.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Operations: 08.n Information Systems Audit Controls

values.description: The installation of software on operational systems is controlled.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Operations: 08.k Installation of Software on Operational Systems
